analysis.purpose: Political discussion about election statistics and analysis

notable_quotes: Actually they only looked at the 'Trump Deplorables'!
shoddy statistics. skewed towards the poor

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Bruce Moskowitz and Jeffrey Epstein discussing 2016 election statistics, with Moskowitz criticizing the analysis as 'shoddy statistics' skewed toward the poor and noting they only looked at 'Trump Deplorables'.
